mean_en: the system by which a vehicle is supported on its wheels and which makes it more comfortable to ride in when the road surface is not even
sentence: A "suspension bridge" is so named because the road is supported by cables.
sentence_trans: “吊桥”之所以得名，是因为桥上的道路由钢索吊起。
word_etyma: suspen=suspend中止 + sion名词后缀 → 中止；停学
